entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Oxford House
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
